mapper.select:
SELECT t.id,t.name,t.className,t.type,t.description,t.createTime FROM jeegem_TASK_LOG t WHERE 1=1
AND t.id=#{param.id}
AND t.type=#{param.type}
AND ( t.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') OR t.className LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') OR t.description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') )
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by t.createTime desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jeegem_TASK_LOG( id, name, className, type, description, createTime ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{className}, #{type}, #{description}, #{createTime} )
